ComicInfo.Summary:
This issue is wrapped up in mystery. Wildstar is tring to go back in time to stop a disaster of some sort and a team of superpowered villains are sent to stop him. Several of these characters including Wildstar himself have some sort of starfish like creature that sticks to their body and gives them superpowers. They fight for along time but Wildstar manages to go back in time unfortunately so does him trackers.

ComicInfo.Title: Born Under a Bad Sign: Part 1
